Reviews.Title: Quality item; east to install and works perfect.
Reviews.Author: alanj
Reviews.Content: Very easy to install; closing and last latching adjustments are very good.  The two  units that I installed  worked excellent for me and the customer was very well pleased.

ProductInfo.Features:
Commercial Grade 1 Door Closer, Size 4
ANSI A 156.4, 300 Series, Grade 3, 500,000 cycles, UL listed.
Chassis/ Closer: Non-handed, cast aluminium, mounting to regular, top jamb or parallel arm applications.
Door Preperation: 9-1/16" horizontal and 3/4" vertical mounting hole locations (retrofits traditional closer) Door Range: Up to 180 degrees.
10 year limited warranty by manufacturer
ProductInfo.Name: TELL MANUFACTURING, INC. Commercial Grade 1 Door Closer, Size 4
